text: **user:** hey jon have u seen the latest fail army vid? it’s hilarious lol **jon:** oh man, yeah i watched it last night haha. the guy on the bike totally wiped out, made me thnik of that time i tried to hop a curb and jst ate it 🤣 **user:** lol i remember that! u okay tho? no more biking disasters, right? **jon:** haha yeah no worries, sticking to my feet for now. safer and less embarrassing, u know? 😅 **user:** definitely safer! got any other funny vids to recommend? **jon:** oh for sure, check out "ultimate dog tease," it cracks me up every time. the way the dog talks about bacon, lol i feel that 😂 **user:** lol i’ll look it up. thanks for the tip!
